title: ‘Pedophile got child pregnant and posted videos of her being raped on Pornhub’
text:
Suspected pedophile Christopher Johnson reportedly raped and impregnated a 15 year-old girl, then posted videos of the youngster being sexually abused on sites like Pornhub (Pictures: Broward County Jail/File)

A pedophile got a 15 year-old pregnant and posted videos of the youngster being sexually abused on Pornhub, police say.

Christopher Johnson’s alleged abuse of the girl was uncovered last September after the child’s mother said clips had been posted on Pornhub and Modelhub.

Johnson, 30, was arrested and charged with lewd and lascivious battery on Wednesday, eight months after cops rescued his alleged victim from an apartment in Davie, Florida.

Detective Adam Granit, from Davie Police Department, tracked down the videos, and wrote: ‘(The girl) is either fully nude (or) topless in all videos and performs oral sex and sexual intercourse in at least two of the videos.’

His team also found ‘paperwork from an abortion clinic’ at Johnson’s apartment, with the abused girl telling detectives that Johnson had gotten her pregnant and taken her to a clinic for a termination.

Johnson denies sexually abusing the girl, and is being held at Broward County Jail, pictured, ahead of his next hearing on child sex abuse charges (Picture: Google Maps)

Police have yet to confirm the identities of the men filmed abusing the girl in the clips.

Johnson’s alleged victim vanished from her home in February, WPLG reported.

She was spotted by a family friend at a 7-Eleven store, who contacted police to report that he’d spotted the child.

Cops were able to track the Dodge Challenger the girl had been driven off in, and found Johnson and the girl at his apartment, it is claimed.

Johnson has denied sexually abusing the child.

He is being held at Broward County Jail in Fort Lauderdale in lieu of $75,000 bond ahead of his next court appearance.
description: Christopher Johnson reportedly abused his victim in Davie, Florida, then uploaded videos to Pornhub and Modelhub
